cmp: 本 (roots or stems of plants/origin/source/this/the current/root/foundation/basis/(a measure word))
mng: small earthenware plate or basin, a monk's alms bowl, Sanskrit paatra

exm.mng: small earthenware plate or basin, a monk's alms bowl, Sanskrit paatra
the cassock and alms bowl of a Buddhist master passed on to the favorite disciple (Buddhism), legacy, mantle
to take up sb's mantle, to follow in sb's steps
see 墨爾本|墨尔本[Mo4 er3 ben3]
mendicant religious order in Catholicism, Franciscan order
